text: Blue's gone... because of me. Why can't I just keep my mouth shut?
I shouldn't have yelled ... I pushed them away. I need to find them.
We've always been together, even when we're apart. But now... it's different.
I can't feel her.
I took Blue's silence for granted...
Maybe it's their way of dealing with things. Why couldn't I understand that?
Maybe if I could just... apologize. Would they listen?
Blue... you're here.
I... I was so scared. I couldn't find you. I... I thought I had lost you.
I know... I messed up. I was wrong, so wrong.
I didn't understand... your silence. Your space. It was your way, not mine.
I just... I need you to know that I'm sorry.
I want to understand you, Blue. Not change you.
You never stopped to think about what I must feel, or even register that I'm different from you.
I like spending time around you Violet, you really know to make each summer an adventure.
But you're too caught up in yourself and how you feel to listen to me.
Then you get caught up in your head and then blame me for not reciprocating.
I am not you.
So don't expect me to be
It's been hard not seeing you for so long.
I've missed you so much.
I'll listen, I swear I will.
I promise
I've missed you too Violet.
But things can't go back to the way they were.
I'ts over Violet
I'm gone.
But... you're here... You're here with me...
Blue... I... I... I didn't know... I didn't...
I'm sorry, I didn't mean it.
I DIDNT MEAN IT
